title: Greater Albion Releases Two new Families
content:
Greater Albion Typefounders have just released (on [MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014105412/http:/www.myfonts.com/browse/foundry/gatf/))two new families. They are both new designs in the spirit of Victorian SlabSerifs. Firstly, there's Bamberforth:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014105412im_/http:/typophile.com/files/c56802086b8f5df8965e0bbf4fc11f_6429.png)

which is a family of five faces, and secondly, Eldridge:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014105412im_/http:/typophile.com/files/043a3ad534f647ee3819c24b355644_5600.png)

a family of three faces. They should very shortly be on an introductory special offer with a 30% discount.

Another preview of these faces can be seen at Greater Albion Typefounder's announcements blog [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014105412/http:/gatf/wordpress.com).
author: Rasendyll
